title: Is everything more important than people think? - Quora

response.answer_text: What about the living world on which we depend, is it important to human beings, for all sentient beings on this planet? “We are responsible for starting the sixth major extinction in the history of the Earth. This is the greatest extinction of diversity since the extinction of the dinosaurs 65 million years ago.” - Christopher Titmuss
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Hunter James Moffett
